resp = client.search(
    index="sales",
    size=0,
    aggs={
        "sales_per_month": {
            "date_histogram": {
                "field": "date",
                "calendar_interval": "month"
            },
            "aggs": {
                "total_sales": {
                    "sum": {
                        "field": "price"
                    }
                },
                "t-shirts": {
                    "filter": {
                        "term": {
                            "type": "t-shirt"
                        }
                    },
                    "aggs": {
                        "sales": {
                            "sum": {
                                "field": "price"
                            }
                        }
                    }
                },
                "t-shirt-percentage": {
                    "bucket_script": {
                        "buckets_path": {
                            "tShirtSales": "t-shirts>sales",
                            "totalSales": "total_sales"
                        },
                        "script": "params.tShirtSales / params.totalSales * 100"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
